trans-unit.source: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.
This class cannot be inherited.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to which this method belongs.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> with which to initialize this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
Gets the `SOAPAction` HTTP header field of SOAP requests that are sent to this XML Web service method.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the `SOAPAction` HTTP header field of SOAP requests that are sent to this XML Web service method.

Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> value that specifies whether the parts of SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method are encoded as abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> value that specifies whether the parts of SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method are encoded as abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> associated with this XML Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> associated with this XML Web service method.
Gets a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing this XML Web service method.
`true` if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process this XML Web service method; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with parameters that are passed to this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with parameters that are passed to this Web service method.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref> object that specifies how parameters are formatted in SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref> that specifies how parameters are formatted in SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with return values from this Web service method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> used with return values from this Web service method.
Gets a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether SOAP messages sent to and from this XML Web service method use RPC formatting.
`true` if SOAP messages sent to and from this XML Web service method use RPC formatting; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> value that indicates the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which this Web service claims to conform.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> value that indicates the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which this Web service claims to conform.
